CWEs: CWE-78: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an OS Command ('OS Command Injection')
description: The function unique_name_375 is vulnerable to command injection. This is due to the use of the exec function with user-supplied input (imagePaths) without proper sanitization or validation. An attacker could potentially inject malicious commands by manipulating the imagePaths variable, leading to arbitrary command execution on the server.
